programme.title: Rough Cut
programme.desc: An actor, Soo-ta requests a gangster, Gang-pae, whom he met by chance, to play alongside him in an action film.

programme.title: Pain
programme.desc: A love story between a man who cannot sense anything and a woman with hemophilia.

programme.title: Following
programme.desc: Sneaking into So-ra's home, Jung-tae finds her dead body. But when it vanishes, he's accused of her murder.

programme.title: Heung-Boo: The Revolutionist
programme.desc: In Joseon, a satirical play by Heung-boo gains fame, drawing attention from both rulers and rebels.

programme.title: Iris: New Generation
programme.desc: During peace talks, a North Korean diplomat is killed, sparking a hunt as NSS faces moles and terrorism.

programme.title: Miss Fortune
programme.desc: A con artist and her daughter target a rich family’s hidden treasure—but the heist takes unexpected turns.

programme.title: Will You Be There
programme.desc: Soo-hyun saves a life of a little girl and receives ten mysterious pills from the girl’s grandfather.And the movie jumps thirty years back to when Soo-hyun was still a medical student and shows Soo-hyun and his then girlfriend Yeon-a who were very much in love with each other. With the pill's help, Soo-hyun travels back in time and meet his younger self. The movie illustrates in a moving way what it means to love and live with a choice one makes for love.

programme.title: The Client
programme.desc: A bed soaked in blood, a missing body and charges of murder. No one can be trusted until the trial is over!

programme.title: My Little Bride
programme.desc: Bo-eun must marry Sang-min due to a family promise. Things get complicated when he becomes her school teacher.

programme.title: The Vanished
programme.desc: The body of Jin-han's wife whom Jin-han secretly murdered suddenly disappears. The mystery and the suspense surrounding the disappearance grows bigger and bigger.

programme.title: The Outlaws
programme.desc: A fearless detective Seok-do decides to hunt down Jang Chen, a cold-blooded boss of Heuksapa, an uprising criminal organization that turned Seoul’s Chinatown into a blood bath. Seok-do is an old-school detective with bravado who has been protecting the peace of his city with his strong fists and bold spirit. Together with team, Seok-do plans an ultimate crime sweep to take down Jang Chen’s gangs in one night.

programme.title: Miss Butcher
programme.desc: A man is brutally murdered. Gu-ho, the detective in charge, suspects Soon-ae, who runs a butcher's shop.
